description:
EC2 API: default max to 1, default min to max

OS API: default min to 1, default max to min

It would seem more logical to keep to these two defaulting strategies consistent.
title: create instance min/max count defaulting logic is reversed in EC2 and native OS APIs

comments.content:
EC2 API: default max to 1, default min to max

OS API: default min to 1, default max to min

It would seem more logical to keep to these two defaulting strategies consistent.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eglynn

comments.content:
Shall we go with following defaults, for both API?
     default min to 1,  default max to min
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bhuvan
